text: Peace, Perfect Peace is a 1918 British silent drama film directed by Arrigo Bocchi and starring Hayford Hobbs, Mary Odette and Mary Marsh Allen.Low p.298 The Armistice that ends the First World War allows French and British soldiers to return home. ==Cast== * Hayford Hobbs as Poilu * Mary Odette as Marie Odette * Mary Marsh Allen as Mrs. Atkins * Charles Vane as Pensioner * Bert Wynne as Tommy Atkins * Evelyn Harding as Mother * Chubby Hobbs as Child ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of British Film, Volume III: 1914-1918.
